msbt.message: Hey, . Remember when you said you'd come and visit me, ?Sowhere were you? You didn't show, so I got worried. I even started asking if anybody'd seen you.Anyway, I'm glad you're alright! We'll hang out some other day.
Hey, ! I know we made plans and all for you to visit, but something's come up.I'm really sorry, ! We'll do it some other time, I promise.

! Hey, I'm really sorry about earlier!I know we made plans for you to come over, but something came up at the last minute.That's totally on me, . But don't worry. I'm gonna make it up to you later, OK?
